description:
Are you looking for echo friendly slam book in your Plam mobile? Then this app for you.

    And are you bore with adding regular predefined slam book and you want to ask your questions to slam book? Then this app is for you.

    There are more then 35 predefined questions are available in the app.

    You can edit or delete or rearranging the predefined questions in this slam book.

    This app will add your own questions.
    This app is password protected.
    This app will allow you to take backup of the individual slam to your mail.
